summary: After serving for the war, Mak invites three soldiers whom he befriended, to his home. Upon arrival they witness the village terrified of a ghost. The three friends hear rumors that the ghost is Mak's wife. Based on Thai folklore.
cast: Mario Maurer|Davika Hoorne|Nattapong Chartpong|Pongsatorn Jongwilak|Wiwat Kongrasri|Kantapat Permpoonpatcharasuk|Sean Jindachot
title: Pee Mak Phrakanong
